refnamediv.refpurpose: Lit les informations sur un champ iBase

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: ibase_field_info retourne un tableau contenant les informations sur le champ numéro field_number après une requête de SELECT. Le tableau contient les index name (nom), alias, relation, length (taille), type.

example.title: Exemple avec ibase_field_info
example.programlisting:
<para>
    <example>
     <programlisting role="php">
<?php
    $rs = ibase_query("Select * from matable");
    $coln = ibase_num_fields($rs);
    for ($i=0 ; $i < $coln ; $i++) {
        $col_info = ibase_field_info($rs, $i);
        echo "Nom : " . $col_info['name'] . "\n";
        echo "Alias : " . $col_info['alias'] . "\n";
        echo "Relation : " . $col_info['relation'] . "\n";
        echo "Taille : " . $col_info['length'] . "\n";
        echo "Type : " . $col_info['type'] . "\n";
    }
?>
